original_text: Which the children of Aaron, being of the families of the Kohathites, who were of the children of Levi, had: for theirs was the first lot.
korean_text: 레위 자손 중 그핫 가족들에 속한 아론 자손이 첫째로 제비 뽑혔으므로

sentences.original_text: Which the children of Aaron had
being of the families of the Kohathites
who were of the children of Levi
for theirs was the first lot
